有道翻译

您抹黑

You discredit

以上为机器翻译结果，长、整句建议使用 有道翻译 。

双语例句

  • 我在被抹黑的天津天津想念您，应该在家照看自己仔细地！

    I miss you, should look after oneself at home carefully in discredited Tianjin Tianjin!

    yingyu.zaixian-fanyi.com

  • 如果任何进一步的异常，如发现有对您的抹黑，您可能需要有进一步的阴道镜检查。

    If any further abnormalities are detected on your smear, you may need to have a further colposcopy examination.

    word.hcbus.com

  • 在洗衣回答说：“不幸的是，这种安排是不可能的，因为就我本人而言，我应该为任何美白，你会立即与您的木炭抹黑了。”

    The laundry man replied, "Unfortunately, the arrangement is impossible as far as I am concerned, for whatever I should whiten, you would immediately blacken again with your charcoal. ""

    www.en400.com
